lines.irish:
Fáiltigí go Ceacht mo Chara (Hello)
Foghlaim seo agus ní bheidh tú ag teacht sa dara háit
Banging out 3CAG agus mé ar stáitse
Ar seachrán ó na Gardaí ón tseachtain seo caite
Tá éad orthu mar gheall go bhfuil mo pubes ildaite
Faic fágtha le rá
lines.english:
Welcome to Mo Chara’s Lesson (Hello)
Learn this and you won’t be coming second
Banging out 3CAG while I’m on stage
Evading the guards from last week
They’re jealous because my pubes are colourful
Nothing left to say

lines.irish:
Don't change the drug laws because I’m raking it in gach lá
Ach sílim gur gá do na Péas iad féin a choinneáil stuama
Ar Bhóthar na bhFál ní bheidh tú i bhfad ar shiúl ó phetrol-buama
Buama peitril ag éist' le techno beidh mise ar shiúl ní bheidh mise le feiceáil
lines.english:
Don't change the drug laws because I’m raking it in every day
But I think the guards need to keep themselves steady
On the Falls Road you’re never far from a petrol bomb
Petrol bomb with techno blaring – I’ll be gone, unseen

lines.irish:
Gardaí ag seiceáil tá mise ag pacáil amach sna sléibthe cosúil le jackal
'Cause that’s where I hide, níl an RUC on my side
Just ar feadh cúpla, an méid sin, táim ar ais i focain paradise
lines.english:
Cops checking, I’m packing out in the mountains like a jackal
That’s where I hide, the RUC aren’t on my side
Just for a few, that’s it, I’m back in f***ing paradise

lines.irish:
An Gaeilgeoir 'Mr. Nice' a chuirtear orm
Ar fáil fríd an ghrian, ghaoth, bháistí agus stoirm
Mar tá sneachta ann 'ar go' ó Mo Chara ar lá tirim
Agus tá Dan Healy paranoid faoi achan abairt a dheirim
lines.english:
They call me the Irish-speaking ‘Mr. Nice’
Available through sun, wind, rain and storm
Because there’s snow ‘on the go’ from Mo Chara on a dry day
And Dan Healy is paranoid about every line I say

lines.irish:
Fuck the Pope, I'm selling dope le Bishop Brennan
Fuck the Queen, I'm selling green le achan cunt sa Kremlin
LSD nó piollaí, focain díolaim an t-iomlán
("How many should I take, Mo Chara said three or something?")
lines.english:
F*** the Pope, I'm selling dope with Bishop Brennan
F*** the Queen, I'm selling green with every c*** in the Kremlin
LSD or pills, I sell the whole f***ing lot
("How many should I take? Mo Chara said three or something?")

lines.irish:
Pearsantachtaí difriúla when I'm selling an 3CAG
Múinte le posh pricks and acting hard leis na scumbags
Sometimes you have to bite your tongue leis na meánaicmigh
Exactly, due the focain airgead sexy
lines.english:
Different personalities when I'm selling 3CAG
Polite with posh pricks, act tough with the scumbags
Sometimes you have to bite your tongue with the middle class
Exactly, because the f***ing money is sexy

lines.irish:
Eventually, imíonn siad, couple o’ quid down
The clowns, running around, saying that legend Mo Chara’s sound
Ach i bhfírinne bhí orm é a dhíol níos daoire daofa
Mar bím i gcónaí ag iarraidh go mbeidh sé níos saoire do na
lines.english:
Eventually, they’re gone, a few quid down
The clowns, running around saying Mo Chara’s a legend
But truthfully, I had to sell it dearer to them
Because I’m always trying to make it cheaper for the

lines.irish:
Leaids as an cheantar nach bhfaigheann laethanta saoire ar bith
Sniff that mate and you'll be back in Ibiza arís
lines.english:
Lads from the area who never get holidays at all
Sniff that mate and you’ll be back in Ibiza again

lines.irish:
Mo Chara i do cheantar
Mo Chara i do theach
Mo Chara’s everywhere
Ar an drabhlás anocht
lines.english:
Mo Chara in your area
Mo Chara in your house
Mo Chara’s everywhere
On the session tonight

lines.irish:
Achan duine buartha faoi Mo Chara
Mar gheall go bhfuil barraíocht ama aige
Mar go bhfuil barraíocht bán aige
Mar gur as Bóthar na Carraige
lines.english:
Everyone’s worried about Mo Chara
Because he’s got too much time
Because he’s got too much white
Because he’s from Rock Road

lines.irish:
Báine dó
Is léir go bhfuil Mo Chara the opposite the [?]
Ní imrím cluichí seachas Cribby 'is Dizzy Dinosaurs
Inseoidh mé duit once more
lines.english:
Too pale for him
It’s clear that Mo Chara’s the opposite of [?]
I don’t play games except Cribby and Dizzy Dinosaurs
I’ll tell you once more

lines.irish:
Ní shílim i bhfírinne gur chóir
Éisteacht le RTÉ nó beidh cuairteoir at your Ma's front door
Smashing up your radio then giving myself fellatio
I dteach do mháthar a gimp suit leathair
Hanging in her patio
lines.english:
I truly don’t think you should
Listen to RTÉ or there’ll be a visitor at your ma’s front door
Smashing your radio and giving myself fellatio
In your mother’s house in a leather gimp suit
Hanging in her patio

lines.irish:
I still prefer your Granny though
Burting her like a fanny coat
Horn agus féasóg uirthi, she look’s like a manly goat
lines.english:
I still prefer your Granny though
Riding her like a furry coat
Horn and beard on her – she looks like a manly goat

lines.irish:
Kneecap, givin' your Da a vesectomy
I'll beat your brother at FIFA when your Ma is erectin' me
Tá do dheirfiúr next to me, I'm selling her ecstasy
Rapping i ndátheangach coursing through my anatomy
lines.english:
Kneecap, giving your Da a vasectomy
I'll beat your brother at FIFA while your Ma’s getting turned on by me
Your sister’s next to me, I'm selling her ecstasy
Rapping bilingually flowing through my anatomy

lines.irish:
Mo Chara i do cheantar
Mo Chara i do theach
Mo Chara's everywhere
Ar an drabhlás anocht
lines.english:
Mo Chara in your area
Mo Chara in your house
Mo Chara’s everywhere
On the session tonight

lines.irish:
Cúpla siolla eile sure just don focain craic
Agus cúpla líne eile pure before I hit the sack
Nuair a dhéanann na Péas seic
Faigheann siad faic
lines.english:
A few more syllables just for the f***ing craic
And a few more pure lines before I hit the sack
When the guards do a search
They find nothing

lines.irish:
Mar tá mo dope about an inch and a half up my crack
De réir boring bastards, tá mé drochbhéasach
Ach ag déanamh a bheag de dhaoine is what I'm best at
lines.english:
Because my dope’s about an inch and a half up my crack
According to boring bastards, I’ve bad manners
But belittling people is what I'm best at

lines.irish:
Like when I wipe my arse with your wee sister's vest top
Agus chuir mé i bhfolach é in a charity shop (Eugh)
lines.english:
Like when I wipe my arse with your wee sister’s vest top
And I hid it in a charity shop (Eugh)

lines.irish:
"Ó mo Dhia, tá tú focain cáidheach"
Throw your baby into the fire
Achan duine thíos for the Messiah
Ní féidir liom bás a fháil and I'll never retire
lines.english:
"Oh my God, you’re f***ing filthy"
Throw your baby into the fire
Everyone’s down for the Messiah
I can’t die and I’ll never retire

lines.irish:
Tá mé imithe ar focain strae
Cuirim scairt ar focain Babestation i rith an lae
Melting heads, is breá liom é
Cuirfidh mé isteach ar dhaoine, go dtí go dtéim ag ré'
lines.english:
I’ve gone completely off the rails
I call Babestation during the day
Melting heads, I love it
I’ll bother people until I float away
